model.strategies
Interface IStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
RandomStrategy, WallHuggerStrategy
public interface IStrategy

An interface used for strategies.

Version:
0.1 (17-01-2011)
Author:
Martin Nicklas Jørgensen

Method Summary
 Direction nextMove(Game game, Player player)
          Decides what direction the player should move based on the player position and the state of the game.
 

Method Detail

nextMove

Direction nextMove(Game game,
                   Player player)
Decides what direction the player should move based on the player position and the state of the game.

Parameters:
game - A Game-state that contains the information needed for tactical decisions.
player - A Player object that contains the player information.
Returns:
A Direction with the move to make.
